MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY18 postcode area of Llanidloes, affecting properties in Penygreen Road, Old  Hall Road  and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  2:23 PM. Our engineers have arrived at the local area and confirmed the power cut has been caused by an electrical fault on our network and are carrying out line patrols. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible.. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 17:25 PM on 18th December 2020..
